metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14392 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An untrusted pointer dereference flaw was found in Perl-DBI < 1.643. A local attacker who is able to manipulate calls to dbd_db_login6_sv() could cause memory corruption, affecting the service's availability.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
